Player.Title: Player
Player.ApplyPresetContent: Are you sure you want apply the "{preset_name}" preset? Unsaved changes will be lost.
Player.DefaultErrorContent: Sorry, you can't name your preset "default". Sequencer needs that for itself.
Player.OverwritePresetContent: Are you sure you want to overwrite the "{preset_name}" preset?
Player.DeletePresetContent: Are you sure you want to delete the "{preset_name}" preset?

PlayTool.Shift: Player - Play multiple effects at the same time
PlayTool.Control: Player - Play multiple effects one after another

SelectTool.Alt: Select - Attach to object on canvas

HowTo.Title: How-to
HowTo.Explanation: With the Player , you can quickly play effects on the canvas, and with the Manager you can end persisting effects whenever you want.
HowTo.PermissionsExplanation: Since you're a GM, you can create effects, and by default, so can your players. You can configure the settings by clicking this button:
HowTo.PlayerExplanation: When using the Player , you need to set what effect to play. Click on the file input to see what database paths you have or just start typing to search. You can press the button next to it to search for a file directly.
HowTo.LayerExplanation: Once you've picked a file, you can do any of the following actions while on the Sequencer Layer.
HowTo.ClickLabel: Play an effect on the spot
HowTo.ClickDragLabel: Play an effect stretched towards a location
HowTo.ShiftLabel: Play multiple effects at the same time after releasing shift
HowTo.ShiftControlLabel: Play multiple effects one after another, waiting between them
HowTo.MoreToCome: ...and more to come in future updates!

DisablePIXIFix.Title: Disable PIXI fix
DisablePIXIFix.Label: This disables the fix for alphas on effects in Foundry - some setups (browsers, hardware, softwares, etc) seems to make this fix obsolete.

Debug.Title: Enable debugging
Debug.Label: This will make the sequencer log into the console what it is doing

ShowTools.Title: Show Sequencer Tools
ShowTools.Label: Shows or hides the Sequencer tools on the sidebar.

EnableEffects.Title: Enable Effects
EnableEffects.Label: Enables effects to be played on this client

EnableSounds.Title: Enable Sounds
EnableSounds.Label: Enables sounds to be played on this client

ExternalEffectOpacity.Title: External Effect Opacity
ExternalEffectOpacity.Label: If you create effects intended to be played for other players but not you, setting this to anything but 0 will cause the effect shows up for you as well, but muted. All Effects always show up for GMs.

EffectCreate.Title: Sequencer: Play Effects
EffectCreate.Label: Allow players with the selected role and above to play effects through Macros and the Sequencer Effect Player.

EffectDelete.Title: Sequencer: Remove All Effects
EffectDelete.Label: Allow players with the selected role and above to remove any effects through the Sequencer Effect Manager.

SoundCreate.Title: Sequencer: Play Sounds
SoundCreate.Label: Allow players with the selected role and above to play sounds through

PreloadClients.Title: Sequencer: Preloading for others
PreloadClients.Label: Allow players with the selected role and above to be able to preload effects and sounds for other players.

UseSidebarTools.Title: Sequencer: Use sidebar tools
UseSidebarTools.Label: Allow players with the selected role and above to use the sidebar tools (they also need to be able to play effects).
